contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City | | official_name = Quintana del Marco, Spain | nickname = | image_flag = Flag of Quintana del Marco Spain.svg | image_seal = | image_map = | map_caption = | subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] | subdivision_name = [[Spain]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Autonomous communities of Spain|Autonomous community]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Castile and León]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Provinces of Spain|Province]] | subdivision_name2 = [[León (province)|León]] | subdivision_type3 = [[List of municipalities in León|Municipality]] | subdivision_name3 = Quintana del Marco | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_magnitude = | area_total_km2 = 23 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_m = | population_as_of = 2004 | population_note = | population_total = 516 | population_density_km2 = 22.4 | timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset_DST = +2 | latitude = | longitude = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Quintana del Marco''' is a municipality located in the [[León (province)|province of León]], [[Castile and León]], [[Spain]]. According to the 2004 [[census]] ([[Instituto Nacional de Estadística (Spain)|INE]]), the municipality has a population of 516 inhabitants. {{Municipalities in León}} {{coord|42|12|N|5|51|W|display=title|region:ES_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of León]] [[Category:Tierra de La Bañeza]] [[Category:Populated places in the Province of León]] {{León-geo-stub}}
